short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to help visually impaired users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Accessibility Image Alt Text Generator is a Chrome extension designed to enhance web accessibility for visually impaired users. By leveraging the power of AI, it automatically generates meaningful and descriptive alt text for images on web pages. This helps users understand the content and context of images, making the web more inclusive. Users should install this extension to improve their browsing experience, support accessibility standards, and contribute to a more inclusive internet. Additionally, users can support the project via the "Buy Me a Coffee" button, ensuring its continued development and improvement.
